data.trans_hint: Anh ấy được cho nhập viện vài ngày.
data.en_hint: He has been admitted to the hospital for a few days.
data.content_game_1: He has been admitted to the hospital for a few days.
data.answer_en_hint: He has been admitted to the hospital for a few days.

data.trans_hint: Trong những năm gần đây, thời gian nằm viện trung bình cho bệnh nhân cao tuổi đã giảm.
data.en_hint: In recent years the average hospital stay for elderly patients has decreased.
data.content_game_1: In recent years the average hospital stay for elderly patients has decreased.
data.answer_en_hint: In recent years the average hospital stay for elderly patients has decreased.

data.trans: Sự phức tạp, sự rắc rối
data.trans_hint: Cô sẽ phải ở bệnh viện thêm hai ngày nữa do sự phức tạp trong quá trình phẫu thuật.
data.en_hint: She will have to spend two more days in the hospital due to complications during the surgery.
data.content_game_1: She will have to spend two more days in the hospital due to complications during the surgery.
data.answer_en_hint: She will have to spend two more days in the hospital due to complications during the surgery.

data.trans_hint: Hồ sơ bệnh án của bạn được bảo mật nghiêm ngặt.
data.en_hint: Your medical records are strictly confidential.
data.content_game_1: Your medical records are strictly confidential.
data.answer_en_hint: Your medical records are strictly confidential.

data.trans_hint: Ba cuộc phẫu thuật đã diễn ra liên tiếp trong mười một giờ.
data.en_hint: Three surgeries took place consecutively in eleven hours.
data.content_game_1: Three surgeries took place consecutively in eleven hours.
data.answer_en_hint: Three surgeries took place consecutively in eleven hours.

data.trans: Một cách công phu, cẩn thận, tinh tế
data.trans_hint: Các bác sĩ phẫu thuật đã loại bỏ các mảnh vỡ của hộp sọ một cách công phu trước khi khâu lại da đầu với nhau.
data.en_hint: The surgeon delicately removed shards of skull before sewing the scalp together again.
data.content_game_1: The surgeon delicately removed shards of skull before sewing the scalp together again.
data.answer_en_hint: The surgeon delicately removed shards of skull before sewing the scalp together again.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy được chẩn đoán mắc bệnh ung thư năm đó.
data.en_hint: He was diagnosed with cancer that year.
data.content_game_1: He was diagnosed with cancer that year.
data.answer_en_hint: He was diagnosed with cancer that year.

data.trans: Sự khẩn cấp, tình trạng khẩn cấp
data.trans_hint: Bệnh nhân bị thương được đưa trực tiếp vào phòng cấp cứu.
data.en_hint: The injured patient was admitted to the unit directly from the emergency room.
data.content_game_1: The injured patient was admitted to the unit directly from the emergency room.
data.answer_en_hint: The injured patient was admitted to the unit directly from the emergency room.

data.trans_hint: Giá tiền quần áo bệnh nhân của bạn được bao gồm trong phí nhập viện.
data.en_hint: Your patient's clothing cost is included in the admission fee.
data.content_game_1: Your patient's clothing cost is included in the admission fee.
data.answer_en_hint: Your patient's clothing cost is included in the admission fee.

data.trans_hint: Một bệnh nhân mắc bệnh truyền nhiễm đã được nhập viện vào chiều nay.
data.en_hint: A patient with an infectious disease was hospitalized this afternoon.
data.content_game_1: A patient with an infectious disease was hospitalized this afternoon.
data.answer_en_hint: A patient with an infectious disease was hospitalized this afternoon.

data.trans_hint: Dịch SARS 2003 đã cho thấy nhiều người bị lây nhiễm hơn dự tính ban đầu, vậy nên lần này chúng ta cần cẩn trọng hơn.
data.en_hint: SARS 2003 showed that more people had been infected than was initially thought, so we should be cautious this time.
data.content_game_1: SARS 2003 showed that more people had been infected than was initially thought, so we should be cautious this time.
data.answer_en_hint: SARS 2003 showed that more people had been infected than was initially thought, so we should be cautious this time.

data.trans_hint: Thực tập sinh và các y sĩ nội trú tại bệnh viện đang làm việc theo ca 12 giờ.
data.en_hint: Interns and residents at the hospital are working 12-hour shifts.
